metadata.title: CVE-2015-1195 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The V2 API in OpenStack Image Registry and Delivery Service (Glance) before2014.1.4 and 2014.2.x before 2014.2.2 allows remote authenticated users toread or delete arbitrary files via a full pathname in a filesystem: URL inthe image location property.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2014-9493.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

glance - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
glance-api - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
glance-common - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
glance-registry - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
python-glance - 1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: glance package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.4-0ubuntu1').
